Articles.Content:
The parttools 1.1.2 do not have the InternalBumpedSpecular shader.

 

Is this shader dead? Can anyone point me in the right direction to get this working again?

OK, so I answered my own question. The InternalSpace shader can be used from the old PartTools, however, they will need to be moved over to the SquadCore folder.

The changes needed are: Change shader name from KSP/InternalSpace/BumpedSpecular to KSP/InternalSpace

Also the copy the LightingKSP.cginc to the SquadCore folder to prevent any errors in Unity.
